links.title: Apple store workers in Atlanta file for the company's first union election
links.description: An Apple retail store in Atlanta has filed for a union election with the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB). The workers at the Cumberland Mall store, which includes salespeople, technicians, creatives, and operations specialists, would be represented by the Communications Workers of America (CWA).

links.description: Apple is used to laurels. Most often we praise its sense of innovation. https://www.google.com/amp/s/observer.com/2022/04/tesla-shanghai-gigafactory-resume-production-amid-covid-lockdown/amp/

links.title: In Shanghai, Tesla Workers Are Forced to Sleep on Factory Floors But Tesla Owners Don't Seem To Mind
links.description: Following a three-week production halt due to Covid-19 lockdown, Tesla's Gigafactory Shanghai finally received local government approval to resume operations on April 19. It comes with an onerous condition, however: All of its workers must live on-site at the factory under a "closed-loop system" in order to reduce the risk of contracting or spreading Covid-19.
